thread.title: QASymphony Continues Rapid Customer Growth Amid Record Quarter
thread.title_full: QASymphony Continues Rapid Customer Growth Amid Record Quarter

author: admin
title: QASymphony Continues Rapid Customer Growth Amid Record Quarter
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 4:30 AM Companies mentioned in this article: QASymphony 
ATLANTA, GA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/22/15 -- QASymphony completed another record quarter September 30, highlighted by brand-name customer wins. The maker of agile software testing tools increased bookings 170% in the first nine months of 2015 compared to the same period last year. Growth was driven by large and mid-market companies that are transforming their businesses through the use of cloud-based software and methodologies like agile and devops. 
Software is changing the way companies organize and operate, according to the latest research. The vast majority of business and technology professionals surveyed last month by QASymphony said software-driven companies operate "fundamentally differently" than other companies, and that software drives their company's most important decisions. Underscoring the essential nature of software to these companies, half of all software development time was spent ensuring code quality. 
QASymphony, whose software automates, records, annotates and visualizes the agile software testing process, is growing rapidly. In Q2 2015, the company was named a "cool vendor" in application development by Gartner, added over 2,000 new users, and doubled staff size at its headquarters in Atlanta. Q3 2015 was yet another successful quarter, highlighted by: 170% bookings growth for the first nine months of 2015 over the same period last year 54 new customers including Brown Brothers Harriman, Intergraph, Parkview Health, Samsung and SevOne Selected as one Atlanta's "Best Places to Work" by the Atlanta Business Chronicle Appointed Brendan Tolleson to lead the channel sales organization 
Also in Q3, QASymphony launched its qMap data visualization tool to very positive reviews: "qMap is a game changer for my team. Not only does it provide real insights into the health of our applications, it also allows us to quickly solve issues when they occur," says Abdul Khan, Senior Director eCommerce Delivery at Office Depot. 
"With software now influencing every aspect of business, software quality has become essential," says Dave Keil, CEO at QASymphony. "Devops teams in large enterprises are aggressively adopting agile testing tools and methodologies in order to keep up with the demands of end users. QASymphony continues to be a beneficiary of this development, as evidenced by our record growth so far this year." 
About QASymphony QASymphony helps companies create better software by being the only provider of truly enterprise-level agile testing tools. With QASymphony's solutions, businesses have the visibility and control needed to ensure application quality in fast-paced development environments. Companies like Nordstrom, Dell, Barclays, Salesforce, AirWatch and Vonage trust QASymphony to improve their teams' communication, productivity, and collaboration. QASymphony is headquartered in Atlanta, GA. To learn more, visit qasymphony.com. Contact:
